findings.title: US - Untrusted Source
findings.description: The contract uses an untrusted external source.

findings.title: TSD - Total Supply Diversion
findings.description: The total supply and balance variables are separate and independent from each other, which may lead to a discrepancy between the sum of balances and the total supply.

findings.title: RLS - Redundant Liquidity Swaps
findings.description: In order to accumulate tokenLiquidityReserves the contract swap tokens for BNB and then swap back the proportional BNB for tokens.

findings.title: RM - Reflection Mechanism
findings.description: The contract could use a simpler reflections mechanism that is based on a classic safemoon fork.

findings.title: TUU - Time Units Usage
findings.description: It is a good practice to use the time units reserved keywords like `seconds`, `minutes`, `hours`, `days`, `weeks` and `years` to process time-related calculations.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code does not follow the Solidity naming convention guidelines, which can decrease readability and maintainability.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: It is important to be aware of the order of operations when performing arithmetic calculations. This is especially important when working with large numbers, as the order of operations can affect the final result of the calculation. Performing divisions before multiplications may cause loss of prediction.

findings.title: L20 - Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: According to the ERC20 specification, the transfer methods should be checked if the result is successful. Otherwise, the contract may wrongly assume that the transfer has been established.
